scripts.devstart: $(gcloud beta emulators datastore env-init) && node --inspect server.js
scripts.devstart-multi: $(gcloud beta emulators datastore env-init) && node server.js & $(gcloud beta emulators datastore env-init) && export PORT=3001 && node server.js
scripts.deploy-staging: gcloud beta app deploy --no-promote --no-stop-previous-version --project=secrethitlerdottv --version=$(cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | sed 's/\./\-/g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]')
scripts.deploy-production: gcloud beta app deploy --project=secrethitlerdottv --version=$(cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | sed 's/\./\-/g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]')
